item.title: Apple Tarts
item.description: > Click to read fluff < This will be hidden from the user unless a button is clicked. Ingredients (8-10 tarts) For the puff pastry: 250g flour (or 2 cups and 1 heaped tablespoon) 250g butter (or 1 cup and 1 tablespoon) 1-1.5dl lukewarm water (or a little over 1/3 cup to a little less than 2/3 cups) 3g salt (0.11oz) For the pastry cream: 38g flour (or 1/3 cup) 100g sugar (or 1/2 cup) 250ml milk (or a little over 1 cup) 3 egg yolks 1/2 teaspoon vanilla For the tarts:
